Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 03:13AM kelb wrote: Libby: In 9/06 I was diagnosed with high grade DCIS with question of microinvasion.  I had lumpectomy with sentinel node biopsy and then reexcision, radiation and Tamoxifen.  I just had my annual mammo and things looked good so I just continue to hope that was the right decision for me. Good luck to you!
